Dear **R** Luminescence users,

we are happy to announce that another new version of our **R** package (0.7.0) just made it to [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=Luminescence).  
As usual: many thanks for your helpful suggestions and comments!
This is a major update and comes with a lot of bugfixes and several new functions. We are excited 
to present some the new possibilties below, however, for a full list of all changes please check the CRAN webpage [here](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/Luminescence/news.html).
